name: Drill Run
description: You crash into a creature, spinning your body like a drill. Make a melee attack, dealing 2d6 + MOVE ground damage on a hit. This attack scores a critical hit on 19s and 20s.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

contest.effect: Affected by how well the previous Pokemonâ€™s move went.
